name: Classic Bruschetta with Pesto

ingredients.name: Pesto Sauce Mix or Bruschetta Seasoning
Herbed Garlic Sea Salt Blend or salt

preparation: Lay baguette slices on lined Sheet Pan and lightly spray with oil using a spray pump. Broil for 2 min each side, or until golden.
Combine tomatoes, sauce mix, oil, salt and pepper in a small mixing bowl.
Spoon 1 tbsp mixture onto each baguette slice. Sprinkle with Parmesan and serve.
tips: To boost fibre intake, use a whole-grain baguette
